about_the_game:
Cloudsong is a cozy 3D platformer that takes you on a whimsical journey through a world shaped like a four-leaf clover. Each leaf is a unique biome, from lush fields to golden shores, misty mountains, and mystical gardens. Accompanied by your cloud spirit, you'll solve puzzles, collect cloud wisps, and unlock powerful cloud abilities to traverse these vibrant landscapes.

Your ultimate goal? To reunite the lost fifth leaf that ascended into the sky. Along the way, you'll face challenging bosses, uncover secrets, and bring balance to the world below and the sky above.

FEATURES


Explore Diverse Biomes
Each zone offers unique platforming challenges, puzzles, and hidden treasures.

Cloud Spirit Abilities
Unlock cloud powers like wind whirl, storm surge, and starry path to overcome obstacles.

Relaxing Platforming & Puzzles
Enjoy light puzzle-solving and platforming designed to create a peaceful and engaging experience.

Epic Boss Battles
Conquer the guardians of each zone and reclaim your path to the cloudlands.

Adventure to the Cloudlands
Reach the mysterious cloudlands for the final challenges that will restore balance to your world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 (DirectX 11 compatible)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 (DirectX 11 compatible)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Explore a world shaped like a four-leaf clover, each leaf a unique biome, in a journey to reconnect the lost fifth leaf that ascended to the clouds. With your cloud spirit companion, solve puzzles, fight bosses, and restore balance to the land and the sky.
